Author: Waff3le
Text: I think it is very interesting that everyone is equal but internally we all think similar things. I think it’s actually a animalistic part of our brains that do this. We want to “mate” with who we Primordially “love” and our brains can be wrong. Evolution.

Author: beezythegiraffe
Text: *APOLOGIES TO ANY HEAVIER INDIVIDUALS WHO MAY READ THIS, THIS IS MY DISORDER TALKING AND I REALIZE HOW SHITTY IT IS AND YES I AM TRYING TO CHANGE IT SO PLEASE DONT TAKE IT PERSONALLY!!!*     I'm low-key terrified of fat people. I would never say this aloud or purposely treat anyone any differently IRL, but I do catch myself actively avoiding friendships with overweight individuals, as well as subconsciously avoiding looking at them. I dunno, I think I just subconsciously think it's contagious and if I get too close, I'll end up looking like them? Also on some way they don't even look human to me and I find that repulsive.
